events.message: I received my order today but I want to return it because it doesn’t meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
System has categorized the issue as Refund based on keywords in customer message.
Customer service agent John Doe assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your order did not meet your expectations. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with your refund?
My order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on your website, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a return shipping label by email.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and will send the item back as soon as I get the label.
The refund process has been started and the return label email has been sent. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to check if you have successfully returned the product and received your refund.
Yes, I sent the product back yesterday and already received confirmation of the refund. Thank you for your support!
We are glad to hear your refund was processed successfully. Closing the case now, feel free to contact us anytime.
